metadata.title: Thursday, 6th December, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how much land has been allocated for the development of the tourism industry in the Northern Province from September, 2011 to-date; and
(b)    whether any funds meant for walking paths at the Kalambo Falls were misappropriated by the provincial authorities in Kasama and, if so, which department misappropriated the funds.

questions.minister: Vice President how much money was spent on by-elections from January to July, 2012 by the following
